product.title: Premium Indonesian Cinnamon
product.description: Indonesian cinnamon is world-renowned for its superior quality. Our products are harvested from cinnamon trees aged at least 3 years to ensure optimal essential oil content. The drying process is done naturally under sunlight to preserve natural aroma and benefits.
product.content: Indonesian cinnamon is world-renowned for its superior quality. Our products are harvested from cinnamon trees aged at least 3 years to ensure optimal essential oil content. The drying process is done naturally under sunlight to preserve natural aroma and benefits.
